DOC.brief_summary: The database biobank establishment start 1997 institute . However , sample size small respect clinical fundamental scientific research 's requirement . Thus Chinese gynecological oncology study ( GOS ) group establish create large multicentre database biobank patient gynecologic disease .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Database Biobank Patients With Gynecologic Neoplasms
DOC.detailed_description: The database contain clinical epidemiologic information patient gynecologic neoplasm , cervical carcinoma , ovarian carcinoma , etc . With data gather database , investigator could demonstrate etiology , risk factor , clinical treatment , aspect complicate gynecologic disease . The cervical cancer database v1.10 include 10,000 case 200 variable establish . The biobank collect blood , fluid , tissue sample , related clinical data consent patient gynecologic neoplasm , cervical cancer , ovarian cancer , endometrial cancer , choriocarcinoma , uterine myoma , endometriosis . Besides , blood sample population-based healthy people informed consent also collect .
DOC.criteria: patient informed consent ; patient gynecologic disease ; patient intact clinical pathological information include inclusion criterion
